posts.post_content:
Here is your opportunity to grab a Slidin' Billy Hamilton in a lower grade with a fantastic Photograph !! SOLDThanks in advance
Bobsbats

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=87935&d=1360898233[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=87937&d=1360898273[/IMG]

I'm going to guess that card came from the Oregon Find from a few years back. 

Nice card!

[quote name="Fred" post=1088845]I'm going to guess that card came from the Oregon Find from a few years back. 

Nice card![/QUOTE]

Dave had the foresight to scan all the cards and keep an alphabetical record.  Even the cards that sold instantly are included.  This card can be seen on this page:

[url]https://www.gfg.com/LLojfind/12.shtml[/url]

I have a card with this stain pattern that can't be found in the scans.  I'm assuming it came from the group that was sold off before Dave found the rest.



-

If so, and I am not sure, that's not who I bought it from. I got it from a Network54 Member and I love the card, but I now have an M101-1 of Hamilton so it's now expendable.

Bob

Matt,

That Hamilton does look the same.  The tell tale sign is the back of the card (not shown on Dave's OJ pages).
It's the same card.  Dave's scanner wasn't very good.  Look at the bottom left corner, it's got the same ding.
